mission: Marvel Comics return: ICE THAW PANEL! Rabin returns! 'PEACE AVENGERS ASSEMBLE!' Oslo Accords panel: HISTORIC HANDSHAKE with Arafat! Discomfort lines visible. Building peace panels: Constructing while wrenches fly! CLANG! BANG! 'TRAITOR!' chants spread like symbiote across panels! BLACK OOZE! Rally panel: November 4, 1995, peace song notes float. ASSASSINATION NOIR: Three shots! BANG! BANG! BANG! Shield falls. 'Et tu, Yigal?' Hospital panel: Fading... 'I am... Peace Man.' Nation SPLITS down middle! Empty suit ceremony panel. Caption: 'Legacy: It's Complicated.'

script_processing.original_script: Marvel Comics returns: Ice Thaw Panel! Rabin is back, calling for 'Peace Avengers Assemble!' Historic handshake at the Oslo Accords panel. Discomfort lines are clearly visible. Building peace panels show construction amidst flying wrenches. CLANG! BANG! 'TRAITOR!' chants spread like a symbiote across panels. Black ooze appears. A rally panel features peace song notes floating. November 4, 1995. Assassination Noir: Three shots ring out! BANG! BANG! BANG! The shield falls. 'Et tu, Yigal?' Rabin fades in the hospital. 'I am... Peace Man.' The nation splits down the middle. An empty suit ceremony follows. Legacy: It is complicated.
script_processing.final_script: Marvel Comics returns: Ice Thaw Panel! Rabin, back from Oslo, calls for peace.  A historic handshake, yet discomfort lines etched deep.  Peace panels show construction, wrenches flying; CLANG! BANG!  'TRAITOR!' chants echo. Black ooze stains the ground.  A rally panel displays peace song notes.  November 4, 1995.  Three shots ring out! BANG! BANG! BANG!  The shield falls.  'Et tu, Yigal?' Rabin, fading in the hospital, whispers, 'I am... Peace Man.' The nation fractured. An empty suit stands in ceremony. Legacy: It is complicated.
